relatedRecords.name: AWS Community Summit - London
relatedRecords.description: Comsum is the Community Summit for AWS. Multi track events with talks and workshops from AWS Community Heroes and Community Members. After the talks networking with 50 classic arcade cabinets, great food and drink.

relatedRecords.name: UC Expo 13-14th May 2020, London
relatedRecords.description: UC EXPO is the largest Unified Communications and Collaboration event in Europe. The two-day event encompasses the technologies that enable smarter collaboration and a truly connected business.
